name.fr: Esprit des Créatures de la Nuit

description.en: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.ar: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.br: (Quest) A alma deixada para trás depois de matar a Bruma Noturna. Estranhamente o rosto lembra o de um troll..
description.cns: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.de: Quest-Item: Eine Seele, die nach dem Sieg über Nightmist zurückblieb. Seltsamerweise gleicht das Gesicht einem Troll...
description.fi: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.fil: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.fr: Objet de quête : L'âme laissé après avoir tué une Créature de la Nuit. Curieusement, la tête ressemble à un troll.
description.id: Item Quest: Jiwa tertinggal setelah membunuh Nightmist. Anehnya mukanya mirip troll..
description.it: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.jp: クエストアイテム:ナイトミストを倒した後に残された魂。不思議なことに、顔は荒らしのように見えます..。
description.kr: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.nl: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.pl: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.ru: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.sp: Objeto de misión: Alma restante de Niebla Nocturna. Curiosamente, la cara asemeja un troll..
description.sw: Quest Item: The soul left behind after slaying the Nightmist. Strangely the face looks like a troll..
description.th: เควสไอเท็ม:วิญญาณที่ถูกเหลือทิ้งไว้จากการกำจัด Nightmist น่าประหลาดใจที่หน้าของมันดูเหมือน Troll
description.tw: 任務物品：殺死夜霧後留下的靈魂。 奇怪的是，這張臉看起來像個巨魔。
description.vi: Vật phẩm nhiệm vụ: Linh hồn bị bỏ lại sau khi giết Nightmist. Thật kì lạ cái mặt giống troll..
